entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
